wikipedia_page.main: Dan Donovan is a British singer, songwriter, and guitar player.  Born in 1960 to a Welsh preacher, he produces music which uses metaphor extensively to draw on spiritual themes.

response: *Dan Donovan (keyboardist) (born 1962), keyboardist for Big Audio Dynamite and Dreadzone
*Dan Donovan (guitarist) (born 1960), singer/songwriter, guitarist for Tribe of Dan
